affiliation_name: Zeno Group, a Daniel J Edelman Company
overview:
MollyÂ brings more than a decade of communications experience to her current role as Vice President at Zeno Group, with a breadth of work spanning consumer brands, entertainment properties and technologies that affect today’s digital lifestyle, including A&E Television Networks, Expedia/Hotels.com, Comcast Cable, Gap Inc., Samsung, Starbucks, T-Mobile, Texas Instruments, Ustream, WIRED Magazine and Xbox 360.

She has held both in-house and agency roles, and has built communications programs across North America, Europe and Asia. As global PR manager for Texas Instruments, sheÂ established a worldwide PR network, growing domestic exposure by 150% and international by 500%.Â  As the Director of Edelman’s Technology and Digital Lifestyle practice in Hong Kong, she drove communications programs throughout Asia Pacific for global brands.

Molly’s expertise areas include: public relations, media relations, digital/social communications, crisis communications, sports and entertainment marketing and event management.
